name: 2024 4th International Conference on Advanced Enterprise Information System
content: Publication: AEIS 2024 welcomes paper submissions on innovative work from researchers in academia, industry and government describing original research work in advanced enterprise information system field. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published into AEIS 2024 Conference Proceedings, and submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus etc for indexing.
